nodes.text: Ank Kit'aar was a planet in the Ank Kit'aar system that was located within the Druess sector in the Mid Rim.

Ank Kit'aar was discovered circa 3000 BBY. During the Galactic Civil War the world was the last known hiding place of Major Kerri Lessev, an Imperial turncoat who had murdered several of her fellow Imperial officers.
As of 137 ABY, the world was located in Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire space.
The planet Ank Kit'aar was created for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game Cracken's Rebel Operatives, published in 1994. It was later charted on a map of the Mid Rim in the The Essential Atlas.
